text: Cyrille Estève aka Cyrille the Spoonman is a busker in the city of Montreal, Quebec, Canada. In 1999 and 2004, his disputes with the city of Montreal over his right to legally play spoons in the street were covered by newspapers, radio and television all around North and Central America, as well as in Europe. In 2001, he was mentioned in The National Geographic Traveler Magazine as a living symbol of French-Canadian culture. ==External links== *Cyrille the Spoonman Category:Canadian buskers Category:Musicians from Montreal Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Cyrille Estève
